item.title: Congress Must Compel Trump to Enforce the TikTok Law
item.description: The Senate should decline to confirm his appointees if he is obstinate in declining to execute the law.

item.title: How California’s Mismanagement of Fire and Water Makes Wildfires Worse
item.description: There are systemic failures going back many years, which have combined to undermine California’s ability to prepare for and respond to fires.

item.title: Trump’s Magnificent Blow Against DEI
item.description: To its great credit, the Trump administration is pointing to a more just and fair future.

item.title: The Forgotten Victims of Government Overreach
item.description: When the state comes after ordinary citizens, too many must endure long waits and arduous legal proceedings to secure justice — if they get it at all.

item.title: Perfection in Houston, Courtesy of the Menil Collection
item.description: Or, near perfection, since I’d ditch its DEI hogwash.
